responses.gpt4: Apologies, Mr. Weeks. I missed what you said earlier. Could you please repeat your request?
responses.our_model: Of course, Mr. Weeks. Your doctor recommends a diet that restricts fluid intake to 2 liters per day and limits sodium to 1500 mg per day. This is to help manage your CHF. Can I share some dietary recommendations with you?
